<a id="EditorSyntaxHighlighter"></a>

# EditorSyntaxHighlighter

**Inherits:** [SyntaxHighlighter](SyntaxHighlighter.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [GDScriptSyntaxHighlighter](GDScriptSyntaxHighlighter.md)

Base class for [SyntaxHighlighter](SyntaxHighlighter.md) used by the [ScriptEditor](ScriptEditor.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base class that all [SyntaxHighlighter](SyntaxHighlighter.md)\\ s used by the [ScriptEditor](ScriptEditor.md) extend from.

Add a syntax highlighter to an individual script by calling [ScriptEditorBase.add_syntax_highlighter()](ScriptEditorBase.md#ScriptEditorBase_method_add_syntax_highlighter). To apply to all scripts on open, call [ScriptEditor.register_syntax_highlighter()](ScriptEditor.md#ScriptEditor_method_register_syntax_highlighter).
